name: The Tiny Colosseum
description:
It is rumored, that after death every warrior must show his power to The Death Judges, which will decide whether he is worthy to go to Paradise or not. You are playing as one of this warriors.

How To Play?

At the start, you have to tap on the button in the middle of screen when you're ready. Then you will spawn on the arena were with time monsters will spawn. You should stab or kick them with your axe, rotating it with your mouse. Also, you can see some potions on the arena. They will heal you when you touch them. But their amount is not endless, though.

This game is endless, so good luck!

This game was created for Kenney's GameJam 2022. You can ask me: "Were is the game jam's theme, "growth"?". Well, the difficulty rises with every new wave, so... Yeah :/.
